product_name: NiteRider MiNewt Pro 750 Bike Light - 2014 Closeout
long_description: The mighty yet compact NiteRider MiNewt Pro 750 bike light offers a "just right" balance between light output, weight and space-saving size to ensure the path or road ahead of you is well lit.
short_description: The mighty yet compact NiteRider MiNewt Pro 750 bike light offers a "just right" balance between light output, weight and space-saving size to ensure the path or road ahead of you is well lit.
